entry.title: BY-GEN V9 Is Coming with Full Geometry Nodes Integration
entry.summary: Curtis Holt writes: Hi everyone! In this video, I'll be giving you a sneak peek of version 9 of the free BY-GEN generative modeling addon for Blender. This version will feature full geometry nodes integration allowing for a seemingly limitless number of surface styles. I'll talk about the planned features including a new content pack [...] Source

entry.title: Let’s Encrypt 根证书过期，导致pip使用清华镜像不信任
entry.summary: 有童鞋问为什么博客断更这么？其实最近忙于换工作，到了新公司得表现的积极一些！所以后面更新肯对非常慢了！ 前几天有个同事反应情况说：CentOS服务器 pip突然不好使了？提示证书有问题。当时解决方案是，使用了其他的pip国内镜像！ [cra ...

entry.title: Check Out Beautiful Grease Pencil Shorts by Studio Daisy
entry.summary: Blender's revolutionary Grease Pencil toolset is steadily spreading and gaining momentum among artists and studios alike, a phenomenon that increasingly leads to the constant discovery of beautiful artwork and productions made with GP. Daniel Martínez Lara just shared one such example by artist and director Ryo Timo working at Studio Daisy. Just dicovered these beatifull [...] Source

entry.title: Meet the Artist: Daniel Chong
entry.summary: About Hi, my name is Daniel Chong, I am a concept artist based in Malaysia with some past experience in architectural visualisation. My interest in digital art really came in the final year of architecture school when I took an elective module called 3D and Animated Design, which gave me a small insight into the [...] Source

entry.title: Blend materials with Rust and Dust
entry.summary: Jan van den Hemel writes: Using Rust, Dust or Dirt is a good way to blend two different materials and objects together. We can achieve this by using the Ambient Occlusion node, both in Cycles and Eevee. Source

entry.title: Halloween Projection Mapping with Blender
entry.summary: Leo from MediaWay writes: I thought it would be fun to do a super creepy Halloween Projection map this year! So, armed with my trusty projector, and Blender (of course!), I set out to make the scariest projection in the neighborhood! Zombies from Mixamo, house destruction with Rbdlabs. Hope you enjoy it! Source

entry.title: Blender Bevel Modifier Not Working
entry.summary: 3D Tudor writes: Blender Bevel Modifier Not Working The first installment of a possibly a new series aimed at troubleshooting problems within Blender. This one covers the Bevel Modifier and how to fix it when it doesn't work. Thanks all for checking it out :) Source

entry.title: How to make a jade material
entry.summary: Jennifer Abbott writes: In this shader tutorial I will show you how I made a jade material in Blender. Timeline: 00:00 Introduction 00:13 Jade Shader Source
